product_name: Eagle Creek Dual Wattage International Converter Set
long_description: Plug in your hair dryer anywhere in the world with this complete international converter set. Use this converter to operate battery chargers, shavers, irons, hair dryers, coffee makers and more. Dual circuit unit operates as a 0-25 watt transformer in the low setting and a 26-1875 watt converter in the high setting. Set includes 5 ungrounded adapters for use in almost any country in the world. Comes with a durable polyester zipped pouch. .
short_description: Plug in your hair dryer anywhere in the world with this complete international converter set.
